trans-unit.source: Specifies the yotal value of sales and all other outputs excluding any VAT. This corresponds to box 6 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the yotal value of sales and all other outputs excluding any VAT. This corresponds to box 6 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.note: Page MTD Return Details - Control Total Value Sales Excl. VAT - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the VAT reclaimed on purchases and other inputs (including acquisitions from the EC). This corresponds to box 4 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the VAT reclaimed on purchases and other inputs (including acquisitions from the EC). This corresponds to box 4 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.note: Page MTD Return Details - Control VAT Reclaimed Curr Period - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the VAT due on sales and other outputs. This corresponds to box 1 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the VAT due on sales and other outputs. This corresponds to box 1 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.note: Page MTD Return Details - Control VAT Due Sales - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the total VAT due (the sum of "VAT Due Sales" and "VAT Due Acquisitions"). This corresponds to box 3 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the total VAT due (the sum of "VAT Due Sales" and "VAT Due Acquisitions"). This corresponds to box 3 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.note: Page MTD Return Details - Control Total VAT Due - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the total value of purchases and all other inputs excluding any VAT (including exempt purchases). This corresponds to box 7 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the total value of purchases and all other inputs excluding any VAT (including exempt purchases). This corresponds to box 7 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.note: Page MTD Return Details - Control Total Value Purchases Excl.VAT - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the VAT due on acquisitions from other EC Member States. This corresponds to box 2 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the VAT due on acquisitions from other EC Member States. This corresponds to box 2 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.note: Page MTD Return Details - Control VAT Due Acquisitions - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the total value of acquisitions of goods and related costs excluding any VAT, from other EC member states. This corresponds to box 9 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the total value of acquisitions of goods and related costs excluding any VAT, from other EC member states. This corresponds to box 9 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.note: Page MTD Return Details - Control Total Acquisitions Excl. VAT - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the difference between "Total VAT Due" and "VAT Reclaimed Curr Period". This corresponds to box 5 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the difference between "Total VAT Due" and "VAT Reclaimed Curr Period". This corresponds to box 5 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.note: Page MTD Return Details - Control Net VAT Due - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the total value of all supplies of goods and related costs, excluding any VAT, to other EC member states. This corresponds to box 8 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the total value of all supplies of goods and related costs, excluding any VAT, to other EC member states. This corresponds to box 8 on the VAT Return form.
trans-unit.note: Page MTD Return Details - Control Total Value Goods Suppl. ExVAT - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the endpoint of an IP address lookup service that will return the IP address of the user who submits the report. The IP address of the user is included with Fraud Prevention Headers when Business Central communicates with HMRC.
